org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.upgrade
Class AeSQLUpgrader.AeUpgradeDirective

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.upgrade.AeSQLUpgrader.AeUpgradeDirective
Enclosing class:
AeSQLUpgrader
private class AeSQLUpgrader.AeUpgradeDirective
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a single "PATCH_*" row in the AeMetaInfo table. Each row will have a name that begins with "PATCH_" and a value that is a class that implements IAeSQLStorageUpgrader.

createUpgrader

public IAeStorageUpgrader createUpgrader()
                                  throws AeException
Creates a SQL storage upgrader configured for this upgrade directive. The SQL storage upgrader is specified by the value of the AeMetaInfo row that this object was created from. The value is the fully qualified name of a class that implements the IAeSQLStorageUpgrader interface.

Throws:
AeException
